title: Angel Hair Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Menu is more veg/vegan than meat. Kitchen makes it own cashew cheese, seitan, and almond milk. Has smoothie/juice bar. Salad is served with house-made dressing. Also on the menu are jackfruit "chicken" salad, tofu scramble, vegan tacos, vegan pastries, daily specials.
